item.title: Tabbouleh
item.description: Recipe taken from BBC Good Food - Tabbouleh with Halloumi and Broccoli. Ingredients 140g couscous 300g broccoli florets 6 spring onions , finely sliced 150g cherry tomato, quartered large bunch parsley, finely chopped small bunch mint, finely chopped juice 2 lemons, zest of ½ lemon 2½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil 1½ tbsp harissa or sriracha 1 tbsp clear honey 2 x 250g packs halloumi cheese, cut into 1cm-thick slices 25g fresh almonds.
